dcterms:creator: Christiane Fellbaum
dcterms:description: A lexical database that provides a rich network of semantic relationships between words, including hypernym-hyponym pairs.
dcterms:title: WordNet

dcterms:creator: Filip KlubiË‡cka
Alfredo Maldonado
Abhijit Mahalunkar
John Kelleher
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for evaluating word embeddings based on random walks through the WordNet taxonomy, designed to assess the performance of embeddings in capturing semantic relationships.
dcterms:title: wn-paths benchmark

dcterms:creator: Josu Goikoetxea
Aitor Soroa
Eneko Agirre
dcterms:description: A pseudo-corpus generated by performing random walks on the WordNet structure, used to train embeddings that capture taxonomic relationships.
dcterms:title: WordNet random walk pseudo-corpus

dcterms:creator: Jose Camacho-Collados
Claudio Delli Bovi

dcterms:description: A dataset designed for the task of hypernym discovery, providing a framework for evaluating models on their ability to identify hypernym-hyponym relationships.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2018 task 9: Hypernym discovery

dcterms:creator: Luis Espinosa-Anke
Jose Camacho-Collados
Claudio Delli Bovi
Horacio Saggion
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for supervised distributional hypernym discovery, focusing on domain adaptation techniques.
dcterms:title: Hypernym Discovery benchmark
